posts.postText:
Hello,

My paypal is finally unlocked...

I got so pissed off last week I call3d them up, and told them to unlock my account... (not in tose words per-say... Diffrent and uglyer words.)

Which reminds me...  People pay attention when you yell over the phone... They may hang-up a few time. But, when you find a person that dosen't... Shit get done.

Grats. Now transfer all your money to your bank before they lock it again. That's what they did with me. They locked it, i called ''em up, then unlocked it a few days later, then a few days later then fucking locked it again. They're cunts.
Paypal has never been locked for me, but good luck with your issues.
